sn35.101:1.2: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.101:1.6: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.101:1.9: Te vo pahina hitaya sukhaya bhavissanti.
sn35.101:1.12: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.101:1.15: So vo pahino hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.101:1.16: Yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi na tumhakam.
sn35.101:1.18: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.101:2.3: Sa vo pahina hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.101:2.6: Te vo pahina hitaya sukhaya bhavissanti.
sn35.101:2.9: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.101:2.12: So vo pahino hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.101:2.13: Yampidam jivhasamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi na tumhakam.
sn35.101:2.14: Tam pajahatha. Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati …pe….
sn35.101:3.3: So vo pahino hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.101:3.6: Te vo pahina hitaya sukhaya bhavissanti.
sn35.101:3.9: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.101:3.12: So vo pahino hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.101:3.13: Yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi na tumhakam.
sn35.101:3.15: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.101:4.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yam imasmim jetavane tinakatthasakhapalasam tam jano hareyya va daheyya va yathapaccayam va kareyya,
sn35.101:4.3: ‘amhe jano harati va dahati va yathapaccayam va karoti’”ti?
sn35.101:7.1: “Na hi no etam, bhante, atta va attaniyam va”ti.
sn35.101:8.3: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.101:8.7: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi na tumhakam.
sn35.101:8.9: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati”ti.
